price: Nihahabwe icubahiro nta ngere Imana Allah, Umwami Aganza vyose, Nyakuri[8], nta mana ibwirijwe gusengwa atari Yo, Imana Rurema w’Ubuhangamo bwubashwe.
arabic: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ
footnotes: [8] Ukubaho kwayo n’ibikomoka kuri Yo vyose, ni ukuri, nta makenga canke amazinda ari mu mazina n’amatazirano yayo, kibure mu bumana bwayo.

meta.transliteration: fataʿālā al-lahu al-maliku al-ḥaqu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-karīmi
